message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think it would be a great fit for you.  I'm offering it to you for $115. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $115 is a bit more than I was hoping to spend.  Would you be willing to go down to $105?
Bob,  $105 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $110,  what do you think?
